testcase.name: Search the product and add to cart and checkout
testcase.system-out: Given Open the Application..................................................passed When Enter valid product "HP" into search field.............................passed And Click on Search button..................................................passed When Click on the Add to cart button........................................passed When Click on the Add to cart button on specification page..................passed When Click on the Checkout link.............................................passed When User select on Guest Checkout in Step1:Checkout Options................passed And Click on continue button................................................passed And Step2:Billing details section pop ups and User enters below details into the fields.passed And Select on checkbox and click on continue button.........................passed And Step4:Delivery Method section pop ups and Click on continue button......passed And Step5: Payment Method section pop ups and Click on Terms and Condition Checkbox.passed And Click on payment method continue button.................................passed And Step6:Confirm Order section pop ups and Click on confirm order button...passed Then Successfull message should be displayed................................passed
